akn:section.akn:heading: Authority to make grants for research, evaluation, demonstration, and service projects

akn:content.akn:p: (a) Authorization; purposes The Secretary may make grants to States, localities, and private entities (and combinations of such entities) to carry out research, evaluation, demonstration, and service projects regarding activities under this subchapter designed to increase knowledge concerning, and to improve services for, runaway youth and homeless youth.
